      • getKeyValue

        public static java.lang.Object getKeyValue(org.json.JSONObject akz_JSONObj,
                           java.lang.String akzStr_keyValueToFind)
        finds the value for corresponding key. Cast the returned object to correct object(JSON object, Array, string, boolean, number)
        Parameters:
        akz_JSONObj - JSON object in which we need to search the key value.
        akzStr_keyValueToFind - key of value we need.
        Returns:
        returns the object, and that is to be casted to corresponding JSON object, array, string, boolean, number.

      • getAllKeyValues

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> getAllKeyValues(org.json.JSONObject akz_jsonObj,
                                                    java.lang.String akzStr_keyValueToFind)
        Returns all the values for all the occurrences of keys in JSON object.
        Parameters:
        akz_jsonObj - Json object in which we need to find the value.
        akzStr_keyValueToFind - key for which we need to value
        Returns:
        arraylist of all the values present in given JSON object for corresponding key.
